### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/29846).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29846#issuecomment-2048425728) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.

> Will this close https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/28413 ?

Not quite, we don't yet have a check. I'd still like to add one, but given we've still got occurances, we'd currently have to add exceptions in some way.
